S01.text:
Dr. Adrian Cole pauses just inside the ER doors, badge still stiff against his chest.

The place is louder than he expected. Not screaming - constant motion. Monitors chirp, stretchers roll, voices overlap like nobody finishes a sentence.

A senior resident cuts through the chaos without breaking stride. An ER nurse catches a falling chart with her foot and does not even look down. Down the hall, another intern laughs too loudly.

No one stops to welcome you. No one should.

You are expected to step in.

CHOICES:
Shadow the resident. Help the nurse. Match the intern. Stick to protocol.

S02.text:
The senior resident does not acknowledge you at first. She hands you a chart mid-stride.

You skim it while walking. She is fast and efficient.

She glances back. Not to check your work. To see if you are still there.

You keeping up?

CHOICES:
Keep pace. Ask clarity. Take initiative. Stay quiet.

S03.text:
The ER nurse sizes you up instantly.

Intern. Gloves. Gauze. Try not to faint.

She works fast. You notice a charting shortcut. Not dangerous. Not clean.

She notices you noticing.

CHOICES:
Cover for her. Say something. Let it go. Ask privately.

S04.text:
The other intern grins.

First shift? Relax.

He gives a diagnosis. Mostly right.

Others hear it.

CHOICES:
Correct quietly. Let him run. Outperform him. Back him up.

S05.text:
You choose caution.

Protocols. Paperwork.

Safe. Invisible.

CHOICES:
Step in now. Keep observing. Choose a side. Stay neutral.

S06.text:
The case escalates fast.

You act.

The patient stabilizes.

CHOICES:
Debrief openly. Thank someone. Deflect credit. Say nothing.

S07.text:
The resident closes the door.

Do not do that again. Actually do. Warn me first.

CHOICES:
Acknowledge trust. Stay professional. Let it linger. Change subject.

S08.text:
The nurse thanks you quietly.

Do not make a habit of it.

CHOICES:
Play it off. Acknowledge risk. Ask for coffee. Set boundary.

S09.text:
Your rival notices.

So does everyone else.

CHOICES:
Stand by it. Smooth it over. Blame pressure. Escalate.

S10.text:
Your shift ends.

Nothing feels finished.

CHOICES:
Stay late. Leave now. Check messages. Reflect quietly.
